name: abwd-slim-build-tools
description: Asset build tools for AB Webdev Slim Frontend

scripts.refresh-d1: npx wrangler d1 export AB_WEBDEV_DB --remote --output=./.wrangler/tmp/db-export.sql && npx wrangler d1 execute AB_WEBDEV_DB --local --file=./.wrangler/tmp/db-export.sql

author: Alec Bielanos
